video.title: Ozark
video.synopsis: A financial adviser drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder $500 million in five years to appease a drug boss.

episodes.synopsis: After his business partner cheats a dangerous client, financial adviser Marty must devise a radical plan to save the lives of himself and his family.
episodes.title: Sugarwood

episodes.synopsis: In the Ozarks, Marty struggles to find a local business he can use for money laundering, while his kids make new friends but neglect a crucial duty.
episodes.title: Blue Cat

episodes.synopsis: Marty finds a way to control Ruth. Wendy worms her way into a job. Looking for another business to invest in, Marty digs for info on the strip bar.
episodes.title: My Dripping Sleep

episodes.synopsis: Marty hires Ruth to pull off a heist. Agent Petty forges a relationship with a member of the Langmore family. Jonah exhibits disturbing behavior.
episodes.title: Tonight We Improvise

episodes.synopsis: Marty decides to invest in the religious sector, unaware he will disrupt a discreet business operation. A surprise visitor shows up at the Byrde home.
episodes.title: Ruling Days

episodes.synopsis: Jacob educates Marty on his business. Ruth devises and sets in motion a deadly plan. Rachel learns Marty is cooking the books at the Blue Cat Lodge.
episodes.title: Book of Ruth

episodes.synopsis: To stop Jacob from carrying out his threat, Marty makes an offer. Agent Petty gets what he needs to turn Russ. Charlotte grows desperate to escape.
episodes.title: Nest Box

episodes.synopsis: In a flashback to 10 years prior, Wendy struggles with depression, Del asks Marty to be his financial adviser, and Agent Petty faces a family crisis.
episodes.title: Kaleidoscope

episodes.synopsis: Russ learns Agent Petty's true identity and makes plans to murder, steal and flee. Wendy stumbles on an ideal business to add to the Byrde portfolio.
episodes.title: Coffee, Black

episodes.synopsis: During his next sermon, Mason falters. Wendy and the kids are caught trying to flee their home. Marty brokers a deal between Jacob and Del.
episodes.title: The Toll

episodes.synopsis: Ruth's dad gets out of jail. Approval for a riverboat casino calls for Wendy's political skills. The Mexican cartel demands reparations from the Snells.
episodes.title: Reparations

episodes.synopsis: When a mobster jeopardizes the casino bill, Marty enlists Buddy's help. Wendy resorts to dirty tactics to get votes. Cade reminds Ruth of her roots.
episodes.title: The Precious Blood of Jesus

episodes.synopsis: Wendy does damage control when Wilkes's pressure on Sen. Blake backfires. Rachel is sent on a mission. Ruth resists accepting her Langmore destiny.
episodes.title: Once a Langmore...

episodes.synopsis: The FBI sends out a second lure. Charlotte slips up while chatting with Wyatt. The Byrdes grow wary of Rachel, who deflects suspicion onto someone else.
episodes.title: Stag

episodes.synopsis: Agent Petty's revelation tests the loyalties of Marty, Ruth and the cartel. Despite the FBI closing in, the Snells refuse to destroy their poppies.
episodes.title: Game Day

episodes.synopsis: An FBI search of the Snells' field yields a surprise. Playing hardball, Agent Petty questions Wilkes. The Byrdes mourn a loss.
episodes.title: Outer Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Mason goes off the deep end and focuses his rage on the Byrdes. Ruth tries to make her dad proud during a boat-part heist.
episodes.title: One Way Out

episodes.synopsis: Darlene makes one too many rash moves. Marty tries to free Rachel from Agent Petty's grasp. Jonah helps his mom force Wilkes to continue his support.
episodes.title: The Big Sleep

episodes.synopsis: Marty finds a way around the Snells. Charlotte hires a lawyer. The Byrdes get a meeting with the gaming commission, whose approval comes with a big ask.
episodes.title: The Badger

episodes.synopsis: Marty makes plans without telling Wendy. Darlene sends a message via Jonah. Wyatt learns the truth about his dad. Ruth realizes Cade must be stopped.
episodes.title: The Gold Coast

episodes.synopsis: Marty is pressured to move money ahead of schedule, Wendy pitches a high-stakes plan, Wyatt lives the good life, and Ruth butts heads in the casino.
episodes.title: Wartime

episodes.synopsis: Wendy asks Helen — not Marty — to help close a deal, the Byrdes get a new houseguest, and business goes boom aboard a rival casino.
episodes.title: Civil Union

episodes.synopsis: The FBI dives into the casino's finances, Wendy's dreams take a dark turn, and Marty worries that the writing may be on the wall.
episodes.title: Kevin Cronin Was Here

episodes.synopsis: As Wendy, Helen and Ruth strive to keep the business humming, Navarro plays mind games with Marty, who worries he'll never see his family again.
episodes.title: Boss Fight

episodes.synopsis: Maya steps up her bid to turn Marty, whose eerily calm demeanor has Wendy worried. The Byrdes buy a horse farm on behalf of Navarro.
episodes.title: It Came from Michoacán

episodes.synopsis: Marty and Wendy tell each other how they really feel, Ruth confronts Wyatt, Darlene lets her ambitions be known, and Ben's past comes into focus.
episodes.title: Su Casa Es Mi Casa

episodes.synopsis: The FBI questions Ruth, tensions between Cosgrove and Marty hit a new high, Sue takes on a new patient, and Wendy recruits for her foundation.
episodes.title: In Case of Emergency

episodes.synopsis: Ruth isn't happy about Marty and Wendy's plan to bury the hatchet with Frank Jr. The Byrdes make a difficult decision about Ben. Maya is reprimanded.
episodes.title: BFF

episodes.synopsis: Ben's confrontation with Helen and Erin sends the Byrdes into crisis mode. Meanwhile, Sam's concerns about the FBI inspire little sympathy.
episodes.title: Fire Pink

episodes.synopsis: While Wendy battles personal demons, Marty struggles to keep their lives from falling apart. Darlene does Ruth a favor.
episodes.title: All In
